scripts.json: node generate-extra-json.mjs && jsesc --object --json < data/dashboard.json > dist/dashboard.json && jsesc --object --json < data/channels-to-versions.json > dist/channels-to-versions.json && jsesc --object --json < data/last-known-good-versions.json > dist/last-known-good-versions.json
scripts.build: npm run find && npm run json && npm run render
